trans-unit.source: Represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 열 또는 행 사이의 공백을 다시 균등 하 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The GridSplitter control redistributes space between rows or columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, without changing the dimensions of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: GridSplitter 컨트롤로 행 또는 열에는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> 의 크기는 변경 하지 않고,</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> 의 간격을 재배포

trans-unit.source: For example, when a GridSplitter resizes two columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of one column is increased while at the same time the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of the other column is decreased by the same amount.
trans-unit.target: GridSplitter 두 개의 열을 조정 하는 경우 예를 들어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>한 열의 속성을 동시에 있는 동안 증가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>다른 열의 속성을 동일한 양만큼 감소.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how to define a horizontal or vertical GridSplitter by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties and by leaving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> properties set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 수평 또는 수직 GridSplitter 설정 하 여 정의 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>속성 상태로 유지 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>속성이 해당 기본값으로 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: **How to create vertical and horizontal GridSplitter controls** |GridSplitter type|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> value|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> value| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |Resizes rows|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |Resizes columns|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the columns.
trans-unit.target: **세로 및 가로 GridSplitter 컨트롤을 만드는 방법** | GridSplitter 형식 | <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>값 | <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>값 | |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | 행 크기를 조정 | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>| <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| | 열 크기를 조정 | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| | 경우 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>보다 크거나 같음 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>,이 열의 크기를 조정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is less than <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the rows.|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| A GridSplitter can overlap a row or column that contains other content, or it can occupy a row or column by itself.
trans-unit.target: 행의 크기가 조정이 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>보다 작은 경우. | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>| <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| GridSplitter 행 이나 다른 콘텐츠를 포함 하는 열은 겹칠 수 또는 행 또는 열을 단독으로 차지할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to define a GridSplitter, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: GridSplitter를 정의 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [하는 방법: gridsplitter 행 크기를 조정](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 및 [하는 방법: gridsplitter 열 크기를 조정](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property settings do not achieve the desired GridSplitter behavior, you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>속성 설정이 원하는 GridSplitter 동작 얻을, 변경할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>속성 설정을.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A GridSplitter may be obscured by other objects that are contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: GridSplitter는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> 의 컬렉션</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> 에 포함 된 다른 개체에 의해 가려질 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to prevent this situation, see [How to: Make Sure That a GridSplitter Is Visible](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이러한 상황을 방지 하는 방법에 대 한 정보를 참조 하십시오. [하는 방법: GridSplitter Visible 임을 확인](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을이 컨트롤은 컨트롤의 기본 스타일으로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 속성은 응용 프로그램에이 컨트롤이 표시 하는 경우 속성이 기본값에서 변경 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 응용 프로그램이 실행 중인 때 사용 되는 데스크톱 테마에 따라 결정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [기본 WPF 테마](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance that a user must drag a mouse to resize rows or columns with a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 행 또는 열의 크기를 조정 하려면 마우스를 끌어서 놓아야 최소 거리를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The minimum distance that is defined by DragIncrement is reinitialized continually as the user drags the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 마우스를 끌 때 DragIncrement에서 정의 된 최소 거리 다시 지속적으로 초기화 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> by the DragIncrement amount, the rows or columns are resized.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 끌면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>DragIncrement 양만큼 행 이나 열 크기가 조정 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: To resize the rows and columns more, you must drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> the same amount.
trans-unit.target: 행 및 열을 자세한 크기를 조정 하려면 끌어야는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>량.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to column and row sizes that are made by using the mouse or the keyboard to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> are made in multiples of the DragIncrement.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 마우스나 키보드를 사용 하 여 이동 하 여 적용 된 열 및 행 크기를 변경 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>는 DragIncrement의 배수 만큼 변경 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the minimum distance that a user must use the mouse to drag a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: 사용자를 끌어 마우스를 사용 해야 하는 최소 거리를 나타내는 값을 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 행 이나 열 크기를 조정 하려면.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 1입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance that each press of an arrow key moves a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 화살표 키를 누를 때마다 이동 되는 거리를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The distance that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> moves for each press of an arrow key.
trans-unit.target: 거리는는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 화살표 키를 누를 때마다 이동 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 10입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates the implementation of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 구현을 만듭니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> 에 대 한는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer"> </xref> 이 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 키를 누를 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 될 때 호출 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 컨트롤이 키보드 포커스를 잃을 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the dimensions of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 차원에서 변경에 응답는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control determines what type of pointer to display after its <xref:System.Windows.Size> is set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>컨트롤이 결정 한 후 표시 하는 포인터 형식을 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Size>설정 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 크기 변경에 대 한 정보는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that customizes the appearance, effects, or other style characteristics for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control preview indicator that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 모양, 효과 또는 기타 스타일 특성에 대 한 사용자 지정 하는 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 제어 미리 보기 표시기를 선택할 때 표시 된는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>속성이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>

trans-unit.source: When you set styles, there are some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 스타일을 설정 하는 경우 몇 가지 제한 사항이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [스타일 및 템플릿](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `ResourceExtension` One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` ``` # # XAML 값 `ResourceExtension` 다음 중 하나: `StaticResource` 또는 `DynamicResource`합니다.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 참조 [XAML 리소스](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: `StyleResourceKey` The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: `StyleResourceKey`요청 되는 스타일을 식별 하는 키입니다.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 에 <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> 의 기존 리소스를이 키는

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 속성 요소 구문을 기술적으로 가능 하지만 권장 하지는 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 참조 [인라인 스타일 및 템플릿](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 바인딩 참조 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>가능 하지만 일반적이 지 않은 이기도 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| A preview of changes to row or column boundaries is displayed while the user drags the control, and the property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None | 행 또는 열 경계에 대 한 변경의 미리 보기 사용자 끄는 동안 표시 되는 컨트롤 및 속성이로 설정 되어 `true`.

trans-unit.source: The column and row boundaries are set when the user releases the mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 열과 행 테두리는 사용자가 마우스 단추를 놓을 때 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> for the preview indicator that shows the potential change in <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> dimensions as you move the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> 가능성을 보여 주는 미리 보기 표시기에 대 한 변경 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> 이동 하면 차원는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is the style that the current theme supplies.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 현재 테마를 제공 하는 스타일입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 식별자는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which columns or rows are resized relative to the column or row for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control is defined.
trans-unit.target: 열 또는 행 비례하여 크기를 조정할 열 또는 행을 설정 하거나 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 컨트롤이 정의 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>설정, 행 또는 열 크기를 조정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> or ResizeBehavior default values.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 원하는 동작을 얻을 수 없는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>속성을 변경는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>ResizeBehavior 값 또는 기본값.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [하는 방법: gridsplitter 행 크기를 조정](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 및 [하는 방법: gridsplitter 열 크기를 조정](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates which columns or rows are resized by this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 이 크기가 조정 되는 열 또는 행을 나타내는 열거형 값 중 하나 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 식별자는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control resizes rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: 표시 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 컨트롤의 행 이나 열 크기가 조정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>설정, 행 또는 열 크기를 조정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the ResizeDirection or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> default values.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 원하는 동작을 얻을 수 없는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>속성을 변경 된 ResizeDirection 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>기본값.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [하는 방법: gridsplitter 행 크기를 조정](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 및 [하는 방법: gridsplitter 열 크기를 조정](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: 행 또는 열 크기 조정 여부를 지정 하는 열거형 값 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control updates the column or row size as the user drags the control.
trans-unit.target: 표시 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 컨트롤 사용자가 컨트롤을 끌 때 열 이나 행 크기를 업데이트 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> requires an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object to be present in its parent tree in order to display drag preview feedback.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>필요는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>개체 끌기 미리 보기 피드백을 표시 하기 위해 해당 부모 트리에 있어야 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: This requirement is typically met by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is available in the default style for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> or in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is created by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 요구 사항을 충족 일반적으로 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>개체에 대 한 기본 스타일에서 제공 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Window>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>하 여 만든 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>개체.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>

trans-unit.source: However, if neither of these is available, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control must define its own <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 둘 다 이러한 경우를 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>컨트롤을 정의 해야 자체 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| When the ShowsPreview property is set to `true`, a preview of the change in the row or column sizes is shown.
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None | ShowsPreview 속성이로 설정 되 면 `true`, 행 또는 열 크기의 변경 내용을 확인의 미리 보기가 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The actual size changes when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> is released.
trans-unit.target: 실제 크기를 변경할 때의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>해제 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to `false`, the column or row sizes are updated in real time as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control.
trans-unit.target: 속성이로 설정 된 경우 `false`, 열 또는 행 크기가 사용자 끌기도 실시간으로 업데이트 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard is used to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control, column or row sizes are updated in real time even if the ShowsPreview property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 키보드를 사용 하 여에 이동 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>컨트롤, 열 또는 행 크기가 ShowsPreview 속성이로 설정 된 경우에 실시간으로 업데이트 됩니다 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> preview is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> 미리 보기는 표시 되 고, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.
